text.text_translated: The Hunger Games is an event every year. The Capitol uses the games to show the areas they did something wrong. This is because the areas fought against the Capitol in the past. Every year, each area chooses one boy and one girl. They are between 12 and 18 years old. They choose the names without looking. They must compete in a big fight. Only one person can live. The young people in the game have a special name. They are called "tributes". Everyone in the country must watch the event on TV.

best_attempt.text_translated: The Hunger Games is an event every year. The Capitol uses the games to remind the areas about a past fight. The areas fought against the Capitol and lost. Every year, each area chooses one boy and one girl. They are between 12 and 18 years old. They choose the names without looking. They must compete in a big fight. Only one person can live. The teenagers in the game have a special name. They are called "tributes". Everyone in the country must watch the event on TV.
